display_long_description:
Introducing Mölkky Game for Meta Quest – the ultimate mixed reality experience that brings the classic outdoor game to life. Whether you’re a pro or new to Mölkky, enjoy immersive, physics-based gameplay that mirrors the real-world dynamics of the game. Knock over terrain pins to score points—hit multiple for quick scores or aim for precision to match pin values.

Key Features:

Global Leaderboard: Compete with players worldwide and climb the ranks. Unlock exclusive throwable items to showcase your achievements.
Rewards Menu: Access unique items through Leaderboard progress or in-game purchases. Customize your matches with exciting rewards.
Practice Range: Refine your skills, test physics, and improve accuracy in a dedicated mode before official matches.
Custom Environments: Play in stunning settings like serene forests, futuristic arenas, or sunny beaches for a fresh, dynamic experience.
Guest Mode: Share the fun with friends. Guests can earn progress on the Leaderboard while accessing your purchased items.
Live Score Tracking: Stay updated with real-time scores and progress toward victory.
How to Win:
Reach exactly 50 points to win—plan your throws carefully! Overshooting resets your score to 25, making every turn strategic.

Experience the thrill of outdoor play and the innovation of mixed reality with Mölkky Game. Compete, practice, and enjoy anytime, anywhere!
